filters.name: Create Spheres
filters.desc: Creates Spheres by rotating Minecarts
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Purge
filters.desc: Deletes the selected mob from the Selection Box
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Fill Dispensers Filter
filters.desc: Original Filter by Sethbling. Modified to support Droppers
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Presistence Filter
filters.desc: Removes all entities in selection box
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Name Mobs Filter
filters.desc: Names mobs in selection box
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Get Block Data
filters.desc: Get a blocks ID and Data value
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Leasher
filters.desc: Leashes mobs together
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Fill Commands
filters.desc: Fills all the Command Blocks in the Selection with the one specified Command
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Clear Items
filters.desc: Clears every Tile Entities inventory
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Spawn Here
filters.desc: Sets the Spawners coordinates to the Spawners current location
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Invisible Block Maker
filters.desc: Creates invisible blocks that are indestructible in survival
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Restone Spawner
filters.desc: Creates a Redstone Activated Spawner Layout
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Minecart Creator
filters.desc: Creates a custom Minecart
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Sign Edit
filters.desc: Edit sign text and replace words on a sign
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Id to Block Name
filters.desc: Changes the Block ID's in Command Blocks to the minecraft:<tile-name> format. The command must be either /setblock or /testblock
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Create Class Tubes
filters.desc: Creates class tubes with armour and item dispensing capabilities
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Rename Tiles Filter
filters.desc: Renames all Tile Entities in the Selection Box
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Block to Command
filters.desc: Turns all blocks into command blocks that use the /setblock command. Only works with 13w37a or above!
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Enchanter
filters.desc: Adds a specified enchantment to every item in a chest, dropper, or dispenser
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Add Vines Filter
filters.desc: Add Vines to the sides of blocks
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Schematic To Script Filter
filters.desc: Converts the Selection box into Python Code for filters.
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Set Block Data
filters.desc: Changes the Data Value of the choosen block in the Selection Box
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Fireworks Editor
filters.desc: Creates firework rocket with custom explosion effects
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Fireworks Spawner
filters.desc:
Select container(s) which will be changed to mob spawners that spawn the firework rocket inside.
This filter is designed to work along with Fireworks Editor.
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Spawner To Command Block
filters.desc: All spawners in selection box will be changed to command blocks using the new /summon command.
filters.author: Tomsik68

filters.name: Custom Heads
filters.desc: Allows creation of custom heads in their block form, comes with a list of premade heads
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Head to UUID
filters.desc: Converts the head format from pre-1.8 to 1.8 format
filters.author: Podshot

filters.name: Update Filters
filters.desc: Updates filters that use a JSON format webpage, more information will be provided later
filters.author: Podshot
